item.title: ACIP Backs ‘Shared Decision-Making’ on Hep B Vax Birth Dose

item.title: FDA Okays CAR T-Cell Therapy for Marginal Zone Lymphoma
item.description: Liso-cel now has five approved indications, the most of any CD19-targeted CAR T-cell therapy. Medscape Medical News
